accordion.title: What is PhDBot Classroom ? How does it work?
accordion.desc: PhDBot Classroom is an AI-Agent training platform that understands and responds to your natural language queries. Ask anything you'd typically ask a human research assistantâ€”get data analysis, paper summary, literature review, and more!

accordion.desc: PhDBot Classroom, can help you developed any kind of AI-Agents. Your Imagination is the only limit. Get new data, build new curriculum, and assign new metrics, to develop newer and better PhDBot for all purposes.

accordion.title: Can I get update regularly and For how long do I get updates?
accordion.desc: Yes, We will get update the PhDBot Classroom. And you can get it any time. Next time we will comes with more feature. You can be get update for unlimited times. Our dedicated team works for update.

accordion.title: Is my data safe with PhDBot Classroom?
accordion.desc: Feel free to toss any instruction and data at PhDBot Classroom, we utilize the latest of cyptographic and decentralized data protocol to ensure your data is secure and protected.

accordion.title: Is PhDBot Classroom available in multiple languages?
